subject: Wimbledon Tennis Tournament
Tennis
lead_paragraph: Justine Henin, who is chasing her first Wimbledon title,  beat Serena Williams Wednesday while Venus Williams steamrolled Maria Sharapova in the fourth round.
snippet: Justine Henin, who is chasing her first Wimbledon title,  beat Serena Williams Wednesday while Venus Williams steamrolled Maria Sharapova in the fourth round.
